ArgonTest.Name: Type test
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
trait A <: Object end trait B <: A public proc _.printMessage(): Unit = puts 'Found B' end trait C <: A end
constructor NewB(): B end
constructor NewC(): C end
proc main(): Unit do val a: A = NewB() match a case val b: B = b.printMessage() end end
